name: Spin of the Dice
description:
A platformer where you play as a spinning dice.

Match the surface number with the number on your spinning dice to not die. When colliding with a surface,  gravity changes direction until you are back in the air, when it goes back to normal.

Controls:

W - Move Up (When on a wall)

S - Move Down

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

L-Shift - Sprint

Left Mouse Button - Rotate Anti-Clockwise

Right Mouse Button - Rotate Clockwise  

R - Reset to Checkpoint
